title: Lady Dread
description: She kills for a demon overlord until a conscience turns her traitor. Now she’ll take one final stand for the living.  Undead Commander Lady Dread wages war without mercy. Until the spellbinding eyes of an enemy youth warms her rotted heart. Defying her demon overlord, Lady Dread steals away with the child in search of safety. Stripped of her rank and her cursed armor, she’s shocked when flesh returns to her skeletal frame… and lost memories creep into her skull.  In search of the truth behind her magical recovery, Lady Dread must find the hidden path to her mysterious homeland. But when echoes from her past start to take form, she fears the secrets waiting on the other side could be too horrible even for her to bear. With a vengeful demon army on her trail, she must summon her courage to reclaim her true self… and save the living from eternal damnation.  Lady Dread is a pulse-pounding dark fantasy novel. If you like grisly battles, spine-tingling suspense, and unflinching journeys of redemption, then you’ll love John Patrick Kennedy’s tale of honor, horror, and war.  Buy Lady Dread to start a gritty dark fantasy adventure that will chill you to the bone today!
author: John Patrick Kennedy
